plot: In this larger-than-life theater, the forces of corruption and redemption have at one another with a Wagnerian intensity that rivals the very best this medium has ever produced. At stake - one man's immortal, indestructible soul.
characters: Matt Murdock, Thor (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Foggy Nelson, Wilson Fisk, Melvin Potter, Tony Stark, Karen Page, Ben Urich, Turk Barrett
